system
Class DataLocator

java.lang.Object
  system.DataLocator

public class DataLocator
extends java.lang.Object

Singleton class that finds location of partitions and other data at runtime

Author:
Manasa Chandrasekhar, Kowshik Prakasam

writePartitionMap

public void writePartitionMap(java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,Pair<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> partitionWkrMgrMap)
                       throws java.io.IOException,
                              DataNotFoundException
Writes partition to worker manager ID map to file in the following format : 0:snoopy.cs.ucsb.edu_HJK,snoopy.cs.ucsb.edu 1:snoopy.cs.ucsb.edu_HJK,snoopy.cs.ucsb.edu 2:scooby.cs.ucsb.edu_MNJ,scooby.cs.ucsb.edu 3:scooby.cs.ucsb.edu_MNJ,scooby.cs.ucsb.edu . . . (n-1)th:partition:blahblahblah.cs.ucsb.edu_HGJ,blahblahblah.cs.ucsb.edu
